name: QuantitativeValue
title: Quantitative Value
description: A point value or interval for product characteristics and other purposes.

fields.name: value
fields.title: Value
fields.description:
The value of the quantitative value or property value node.

  • For QuantitativeValue and MonetaryAmount, the recommended type for values is 'Number'.
  • For PropertyValue, it can be 'Text;', 'Number', 'Boolean', or 'StructuredValue'.

fields.name: maxValue
fields.title: Max Value
fields.description: The upper value of some characteristic or property.

fields.name: unitCode
fields.title: Unit Code
fields.description: The unit of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (3 characters) or a URL. Other codes than the UN/CEFACT Common Code may be used with a prefix followed by a colon.

fields.name: unitText
fields.title: Unit Text
fields.description: A string or text indicating the unit of measurement. Useful if you cannot provide a standard unit code for unitCode.

fields.name: minValue
fields.title: Min Value
fields.description: The lower value of some characteristic or property.
